column5: Beautiful modern decor, 2 story home with many commodities. Tile 1st Floor, carpet on 2nd floor only (no shoes please on carpet). Home is close to mall, restaurants, parks and more.  PROVIDED: Linens Shower Towels Hand Towels BBQ Pit (Must be clean or pay $50) Kitchen Fully Equipped 2 Kitchen Trash Bags 1 Toilet Paper Roll per Bathroom  NOT PROVIDED (Unless other guests leave behind) NO WASH CLOTHS Shampoo/Conditioner & Body Wash/Wash Cloth Food Kitchen Soap/Sponge  Dishwasher
column8: Barclay Home between Sea World & Six Flags
